messages.message: Hello, I need help with my account.
Hi John! How can I assist you today?
I can't log in to my account.
Have you tried resetting your password?
Yes, but I didn't receive the reset email.
Let me check that for you. What's your email address?
john.smith@example.com
I've resent the password reset link. Please check your inbox.
Thanks for the info!
Hi, I placed an order yesterday.
Hello Sarah! I can help with that. What's your order number?
It's #ORD-45678
Thanks! Your order is scheduled for delivery tomorrow.
Can you give me a time estimate?
Delivery is expected between 10 AM and 2 PM.
When will my order arrive?

lastMessage: I need a refund for my purchase

messages.message: Hello, I want to return an item.
Hi Michael, I can help with returns. What's the issue?
The product doesn't match the description.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have the order number?
Yes, it's #ORD-78901
I've initiated a return for this order. You'll receive an email with instructions.
I need a refund for my purchase
Hi there!
Hello Emily! How can I help you today?
I have a question about your premium service.
Of course! What would you like to know?
What features does it include?
Premium includes advanced analytics, priority support, and unlimited storage.
That sounds great. How do I upgrade?
You can upgrade from your account settings or I can send you a direct link.
Please send the link.
I've sent the upgrade link to your email.
Thanks for your help!

lastMessage: Is there a mobile app available?

messages.message: Good morning!
Good morning David! How can I assist you?
I was wondering if you have a mobile app.
Yes! We have iOS and Android apps available.
Where can I download it?
You can find links to both app stores on our website's download page.
Is there a mobile app available?
